errors.error_description: The instructions incorrectly advise installing the 'vkbottle' package globally before creating and activating the virtual environment, defeating the purpose of the virtual environment.
correction_candidates: Correct order: `python -m venv venv`, then `source venv/bin/activate`, then `pip install vkbottle`.
Correct order: `pip install virtualenv`, then `virtualenv venv`, then `source venv/bin/activate`, then `pip install vkbottle`.
Correct command: `python -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install vkbottle`.
Correct order: `pip install vkbottle`, then `python -m venv venv --system-site-packages`, then `source venv/bin/activate`.
errors.golden_answer: Correct order: `python -m venv venv`, then `source venv/bin/activate`, then `pip install vkbottle`.
